results.title: Metformin Alleviates Delayed Hydrocephalus after Intraventricular Hemorrhage by Inhibiting Inflammation and Fibrosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ may be a promising therapeutic agent to prevent delayed @DISEASE_Hydrocephalus @DISEASE_MESH:D006849 @@@hydrocephalus@@@ following @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Intraventricular_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000074042 @@@IVH@@@.

results.title: Metformin Preserves VE-Cadherin in Choroid Plexus and Attenuates Hydrocephalus via VEGF/VEGFR2/p-Src in an Intraventricular Hemorrhage Rat Model
results.text_hl: Whether the glymphatic system was associated with the function of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Intraventricular_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000074042 @@@IVH@@@ remains unknown.
